sentence.text: De novo monoallelic mutations in the adenylate cyclase-activating dopamine receptor signaling pathway gene, encoding a β subunit of heterotrimeric G proteins, cause a newly recognized disorder with the typical clinical picture of severe developmental delay/intellectual disability, hypotonia and extrapyramidal symptoms.

entity.text: adenylate cyclase-activating dopamine receptor signaling pathway

sentence.text: We describe another case of the condition with manifestations of cutaneous mastocytosis associated with a novel do novo mutation adenylate cyclase-activating dopamine receptor signaling pathwayNM_001282539.1: c.230G AAAA T; p.(Gly77Val).

entity.text: adenylate cyclase-activating dopamine receptor signaling pathway
